settings.question: How does the free preview work?
settings.answer: Upload any photo of your pet and you'll instantly see it transformed into a vibrant color portrait ‚Äî completely free, no account required. If you love it, you can order it on any of our 20+ products.

settings.question: What kind of photo works best?
settings.answer: Any clear photo where your pet's face is visible works well. Phone photos are perfect. Good lighting helps us capture the most accurate colors in your pet's coat.

settings.question: How long does it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: Most orders ship within 3‚Äì5 business days. You'll receive a digital preview before your order ships so you can make sure everything is perfect.

settings.question: Can I see my pet in other styles too?
settings.answer: Absolutely! When you upload your photo, you'll see your pet in all available styles side by side. You can compare and choose the one that speaks to you ‚Äî or order more than one.
